Subject: Stranded on the Moon
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107
From: Yanshosh@...

::Ramulus::

Ramulus jumps back as he sees the grenades flying toward the shots, firing 
three shots in the air. Two of them hit, detonating the grenades in midspace, 
but the last one goes off by an inch, the grenade hitting the shuttle, 
exploding.

Ramulus swears, spinning to look at the shuttle as the grenade hits in the 
side, tearing the plating apart. He runs into the ship, quickly tapping a few 
keys to bring up a scan of the vessel. He sighs, somewhat in relief: none of 
the systems were damaged, but there was no way the vessel would survive 
re-entry.

Ramulus looks at Fliq. They were stranded on the stinkin' moon, and Fliq 
needed medical attention!

The ram swears, turning back to the screens and tapping a few keys.
